com.phunware.mapping.library.maps

Class PwBuildingMapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.mapping.library.maps.PwBuildingMapManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.location.LocationListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener, com.phunware.location.PwLocationListener

    public class PwBuildingMapManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener, com.phunware.location.PwLocationListener
    The PwBuildingMapManager provides a simple interface for fetching building data and resources. All data and assets fetched by this object are cached on the device.
    See Also:
    LocationListener, GoogleMap.OnCameraChangeListener, com.phunware.mapping.library.maps.IPwMapBuilding, com.phunware.mapping.library.maps.IPwMapFloor, com.phunware.mapping.library.maps.IPwMapLocation, com.phunware.mapping.library.maps.IPwMapMarker

        Creates a route from POI to POI
        Parameters:

      • createRoute

        public boolean createRoute(android.content.Context context,
                  long endPointId,
                  boolean isAccessible)
        Creates a route from current location to POI
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        endPointId - the POI to route to
        isAccessible - the accessible flag, true for accessible route, false for non-accessible route
        Returns:
        true if the call is made to get routes false if no attempt to get routes is made; if return value is false, consider calling createRoute(Context context, long floorId, LatLng latLng, long endPointId).

      • createRoute

        public boolean createRoute(android.content.Context context,
                  com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng,
                  long endPointId,
                  boolean isAccessible)
        Creates a route from a location to an endpoint. Use this if you want to use a different location than the one set in the GoogleMap. The route will be created using the location on the currently displayed floor.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        latLng - the lat/long coordinates for the start of the route
        endPointId - the POI ID for the end of the route
        isAccessible - the accessible flag, true for accessible route, false for non-accessible route
        Returns:
        true if the call is made to get routes, false if no attempt to get routes is made

      • createRoute

        public boolean createRoute(android.content.Context context,
                  long floorId,
                  com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng,
                  long endPointId,
                  boolean isAccessible)
        Creates a route from a location to an endpoint. Use this if you want to use a different location than the one set in the GoogleMap.
        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        floorId - the id of the PwFloor object for the start of the route. If Long.MIN_VALUE, the currently shown floor will be used.
        latLng - the lat/long coordinates for the start of the route
        endPointId - the POI ID for the end of the route
        isAccessible - the accessible flag, true for accessible route, false for non-accessible route
        Returns:
        true if the call is made to get routes, false if no attempt to get routes is made
